QuestData.Title: Now That We're Friends...
QuestData.Description: The naga of the Bloodscale Enclave to the northeast have begun to kill our people. We cannot allow this to continue, $c!$B$BWe suggest that you teach them a lesson as proof of our friendship.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 12 Bloodscale Slavedrivers and 6 Bloodscale Enchantresses, and then return to Gzhun'tt at Sporeggar in Zangarmarsh.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you paid the naga a visit yet?
QuestData.RewardText: <Gzhun'tt nods to you.>$B$BWe are pleased that you have affirmed our friendship, $n. Perhaps the naga heathens will think twice about harassing us in the future now that we have such a powerful ally?
